s244: Fourteenth year: King Xuan ascended the throne; the Gonghe regency ended.
s567: Fourth year: Took a Qi woman as his consort.
s597: Lu Xiao Gong first year (of his reign). Bo Yu was established as ruler, called one of the various princes. Bo Yu was the grandson of Wu Gong.
s607: Zheng Huan Gong You first year: first enfeoffment. Younger brother of King Xuan of Zhou's mother.
s615: Seventh year: Because of the campaign against Tiao, gave birth to Crown Prince Qiu.
s663: Tenth year: fought the battle of Qian Mu. Gave birth to Qiu's younger brother Cheng Shi. The two sons' names were reversed; the noblemen criticized this. Later there was disorder.
s698: Thirty-first year: Song Hui Gong passed away.
s714: Song Dai Gong was established. First year.
s757: Eleventh year: King Xuan of Zhou executed Bo Yu, established his younger brother Cheng as ruler; this was Xiao Gong.
s935: Twenty-seventh year: Mu Hou died; his younger brother Shang Shu established himself as ruler; Crown Prince Qiu fled.
s999: Fourth year: Qiu attacked and killed Shang Shu, established himself as Wen Hou.
s1012: Second year: the San Chuan earthquake.
s1028: Third year: the king took Bao Si.
s1156: Eleventh year: King You was killed by the Quan Rong.
s1160: Seventh year: began to be ranked among the feudal lords.
s1167: Thirty-sixth year: because of King You, was killed by the Quan Rong.
s1176: Eighth year: first established the Xi altar, sacrificed to the White Emperor.
s1240: Twelfth year: attacked the Rong, reached Qi, and died.
s1327: Tenth year: married the daughter of Shen Hou, Wu Jiang.
s1391: Fourteenth year: gave birth to Zhuang Gong Wu Sheng.
s1400: Tenth year: built the Fu altar.
s1436: Chen Wen Gong Yu first year: gave birth to Huan Gong Bao and Li Gong Ta. Ta's mother was a Cai woman.
s1439: Seventeenth year: gave birth to Tai Shu Duan; the mother wished to establish Duan, but the duke would not listen.
s1530: Eighteenth year: gave birth to the mother of Lu Huan Gong.
s1544: Nineteenth year: made sacrifices to Chen Bao.
s1575: Jin Zhao Hou first year: enfeoffed his uncle Cheng Shi at Qu Wo. Qu Wo was larger than the state; the noblemen criticized saying: 'The Jin disorder began with Qu Wo.'
s1580: Tenth year: Wen Gong passed away.
s1615: Zheng Zhuang Gong Wu Sheng first year: Ji Zhong was chancellor.
s1643: Seventeenth year: favored concubine Zi Zhou Xu; Zhou Xu was fond of war.
s1671: Pan Fu killed Zhao Hou, tried to install Cheng Shi, but failed. Zhao Hou's son was established as ruler; this was Xiao Hou.
s1739: Twenty-third year: the consort had no sons; Huan Gong was established.
s1771: Second year: younger brother Zhou Xu was arrogant; Huan Gong deposed him and he fled.
s1799: Ninth year: Qu Wo Huan Shu Cheng Shi died; his son Dai was established as Zhuang Bo.
s1830: Second year: younger brother Yi Zhong year gave birth to Gong Sun Wu Zhi.
s1834: Nineteenth year: the duke died; commanded to establish younger brother He as Mu Gong.
s1911: Sixteenth year: Qu Wo Zhuang Bo killed Xiao Hou; the Jin people established Xiao Hou's son Que as E Hou.
s1927: Jin E Hou Que first year: Qu Wo was stronger than Jin.
s1941: Lu Yin Gong Xi Gu first year: mother Sheng Zi.
s1951: Twenty-second year: Duan created disorder and fled.
s1967: Twenty-third year: the duke regretted it, thought of his mother and could not see her, dug a tunnel to meet her.
s1973: Third year, second month: solar eclipse.
s1978: Ninth year: the duke entrusted Kong Fu to establish Shang Gong. Feng fled to Zheng.
s1983: Twenty-fourth year: invaded Zhou and took the grain.
s1995: Sixteenth year: Zhou Xu assassinated the duke and established himself.
s1996: Twenty-sixth year: Wei Shi Que came to report, therefore seized Zhou Xu.
s2004: Second year: sent Guo Gong to attack Jin's Qu Wo.
s2005: Fifth year: the duke watched fishing at Tang; the noblemen criticized this.
s2007: Sixth year: E Hou died. Qu Wo Zhuang Bo again attacked Jin. Established E Hou's son Guang as Ai Hou.
s2010: Second year: Zheng attacked us. We attacked Zheng.
s2011: Wei Xuan Gong Jin first year: the people established him together. Executed Zhou Xu.
